title: Bernal is Back: Just Weeks After Collarbone Fracture, Colombian Star Eyes Big Ride in Catalunya
content:
Colombian star shows remarkable ability to bounce back: ‘I’d like to stand on the podium again and fight for every stage.’

Read the full article at Bernal is Back: Just Weeks After Collarbone Fracture, Colombian Star Eyes Big Ride in Catalunya on Velo.
author: sstokes
